en:
This all-in-one participation platform is an initiative of your municipality or organisation and can be used for different public consultation processes: collecting ideas, voting, discussing, surveys, polls, participatory budgeting, online mapping, scenario planning, support for advisory boards and committees, ...

On the home page, you'll see which processes are active and in which phase they currently are.

How do I sign in on the platform?

Signing in is done easily by giving your first and last name and your e-mail address. You could also use your Google or Facebook account. Only your first and last name will be visible to others.

Can I use the platform myself, e.g. to organise a public consultation?

Absolutely. Ask the responsible within your municipality or organisation to give you the needed permission rights to become a project moderator. Once granted these permissions, you can set up your own project and timeline and share the information you want (video, documents, images, ...). This will also allow you to invite others to the platform, enabling them to post ideas within your project, vote or comment.

Can I participate as an association/organisation/committee?

Yes, that's possible. Given that only your first and last name are visible to others on the platform, you can simply use your organisation's name while setting up your profile.

Why would I use this platform and not create a website myself?

A team of dedicated developers and specialists in online participation (CitizenLab, commissioned by your municipality or organisation) is improving and updating this platform on a daily basis. Even the smallest bug gets tackled immediately and if you have creative proposals, they can help you pointing out which features of the platform can be used for this or which ones are in the pipeline.

Need more information? Do you want to use the platform? Questions or feedback? Contact the responsible within your municipality or organisation. Or contact CitizenLab through support@citizenlab.co.

ar-MA:
منصة المشاركة هذههي مبادرة من بلديتك أو مؤسستك، ويمكن استخدامها في عمليات التشاور العامة المختلفة: جمع الأفكار، والتصويت، والمناقشة، والمشاركة في الاستبيانات والاستطلاعات، وتحديد الميزانية التشاركية، ورسم الخرائط عبر الإنترنت، وتخطيط السيناريو، ودعم المجالس واللجان الاستشارية، ...

في الصفحة الرئيسية سترى العمليات النشطةوأي مرحلة تمر بها حاليًا.

كيف يمكنني تسجيل الدخول إلى المنصة؟

يمكنك تسجيل الدخول بسهولة عن طريق تقديم اسمك الأول واسم عائلتك وعنوان بريدك الإلكتروني. يمكنك أيضًا استخدام حسابك على جوجل أو فيسبوك. وسيكون اسمك الأول واسم عائلتك فقط مرئيين للآخرين.

هل يمكنني استخدام المنصة بنفسي، على سبيل المثال لتنظيم استشارة عامة؟

بالطبع يمكنك ذلك، فقط اطلب من المسؤول داخل بلديتك أو مؤسستك أن يمنحك الأذونات اللازمة لتصبح مشرفًا على المشروع. وبمجرد منحك هذه الأذونات، ستتمكن من إعداد مشروعك الخاص وتحديد الجدول الزمني ومشاركة المعلومات التي تريدها (فيديوهات، مستندات، صور، ...). سيسمح لك هذا أيضًا بدعوة الآخرين إلى المنصة، ما يمكّنهم من نشر الأفكار ضمن مشروعك أو التصويت أو التعليق.

هل يمكنني المشاركة كجمعية/ مؤسسة/ لجنة؟

نعم، يمكنك ذلك. فنظرًا إلى أن اسمك الأول واسم عائلتك فقط مرئيان للآخرين على المنصة، يمكنك ببساطة استخدام اسم مؤسستك أثناء إعداد ملف التعريف الخاص بك.

لمَ قد أستخدم هذه المنصة ولا أقوم بإنشاء موقع إلكتروني بنفسي؟

يقوم فريق من المطورين والمتخصصين في مجال المشاركة عبر الإنترنت ( CitizenLab ، بتكليف من البلدية أو المؤسسة) بتحسين و تحديث هذه المنصة على أساس يومي. فحتى أصغر الأخطاء تتم معالجتها على الفور، وإذا كان لديك مقترحات إبداعية، فيمكنهم مساعدتك في الإشارة إلى ميزات المنصة أو إلى الميزات قيد التنفيذ حاليًا والتي يمكنك استخدامها لهذا الغرض.

هل أنت بحاجة إلى المزيد من المعلومات؟ هل تريد استخدام المنصة؟ ألديك أي أسئلة أو ملاحظات؟ اتصل بالمسؤول داخل بلديتك أو مؤسستك. أو اتصل بـ CitizenLab من خلال support@citizenlab.co.

ca-ES:
This all-in-one participation platform is an initiative of your municipality or organisation and can be used for different public consultation processes: collecting ideas, voting, discussing, surveys, polls, participatory budgeting, online mapping, scenario planning, support for advisory boards and committees, ...

On the home page, you'll see which processes are active and in which phase they currently are.

How do I sign in on the platform?

Signing in is done easily by giving your first and last name and your e-mail address. You could also use your Google or Facebook account. Only your first and last name will be visible to others.

Can I use the platform myself, e.g. to organise a public consultation?

Absolutely. Ask the responsible within your municipality or organisation to give you the needed permission rights to become a project moderator. Once granted these permissions, you can set up your own project and timeline and share the information you want (video, documents, images, ...). This will also allow you to invite others to the platform, enabling them to post ideas within your project, vote or comment.

Can I participate as an association/organisation/committee?

Yes, that's possible. Given that only your first and last name are visible to others on the platform, you can simply use your organisation's name while setting up your profile.

Why would I use this platform and not create a website myself?

A team of dedicated developers and specialists in online participation (CitizenLab, commissioned by your municipality or organisation) is improving and updating this platform on a daily basis. Even the smallest bug gets tackled immediately and if you have creative proposals, they can help you pointing out which features of the platform can be used for this or which ones are in the pipeline.

Need more information? Do you want to use the platform? Questions or feedback? Contact the responsible within your municipality or organisation. Or contact CitizenLab through support@citizenlab.co.

el-GR:
This all-in-one participation platform is an initiative of your municipality or organisation and can be used for different public consultation processes: collecting ideas, voting, discussing, surveys, polls, participatory budgeting, online mapping, scenario planning, support for advisory boards and committees, ...

On the home page, you'll see which processes are active and in which phase they currently are.

How do I sign in on the platform?

Signing in is done easily by giving your first and last name and your e-mail address. You could also use your Google or Facebook account. Only your first and last name will be visible to others.

Can I use the platform myself, e.g. to organise a public consultation?

Absolutely. Ask the responsible within your municipality or organisation to give you the needed permission rights to become a project moderator. Once granted these permissions, you can set up your own project and timeline and share the information you want (video, documents, images, ...). This will also allow you to invite others to the platform, enabling them to post ideas within your project, vote or comment.

Can I participate as an association/organisation/committee?

Yes, that's possible. Given that only your first and last name are visible to others on the platform, you can simply use your organisation's name while setting up your profile.

Why would I use this platform and not create a website myself?

A team of dedicated developers and specialists in online participation (CitizenLab, commissioned by your municipality or organisation) is improving and updating this platform on a daily basis. Even the smallest bug gets tackled immediately and if you have creative proposals, they can help you pointing out which features of the platform can be used for this or which ones are in the pipeline.

Need more information? Do you want to use the platform? Questions or feedback? Contact the responsible within your municipality or organisation. Or contact CitizenLab through support@citizenlab.co.

es-CL: Descubre más información relacionada con la plataforma.
es-ES: Descubre más información relacionada con la plataforma.
fr-BE:
Ceci est une plateforme de participation à l'initiative de votre municipalité ou de votre organisation. Elle peut être utilisée pour différents processus de consultations publics : via une collecte d'idées, un vote, des discussions, un sondage, une enquête, un budget participatif, une cartographie interactive, un choix entre plusieurs scenarios, un soutien pour les conseils communaux, municipaux, ou les comités, etc.

Sur la page d'accueil, vous verrez quels sont les processus actifs et dans quelle phase ils se trouvent actuellement.

Comment puis-je me connecter sur la plateforme ?

Il est très simple de s'inscrire en entrant son nom, prénom et adresse e-mail. vous pouvez également utiliser votre compte Google ou Facebook. Seulement vos nom et prénom seront visibles pour les autres utilisateurs.

Puis-je utiliser la plateforme moi-même, pour organiser une consultation publique par exemple ?

Absolument. Demandez au responsable de votre commune ou de organisation de vous donner les droits nécessaires pour devenir un modérateur de projet. Une fois obtenus, vous pouvez créer votre propre projet et ligne de temps, et partager l'information que vous désirez (vidéos, documents, images, etc.) Cela vous donnera également la possibilité d'inviter d'autres utilisateurs sur la plateforme, de leur permettre de poster des idées au sein de votre projet, ou bien de voter et commenter.

Puis-je participer en tant qu'association, organisation, comité ?

Oui, c'est possible. Puisque seul le nom et le prénom de l'utilisateur sont visibles aux autres sur la plateforme, vous pouvez simplement utiliser le nom de votre organisation lors de la création de votre profil.

Pourquoi devrais-je utiliser cette plateforme au lieu de créer un site moi-même ?

Une équipe de développeurs et de spécialistes de la participation en ligne (CitizenLab, commissionné par votre commune ou votre organisation) améliore et met à jour cette plateforme au quotidien. Chaque bug notifié est résolu immédiatement et si vous avez des propositions créatives, ils peuvent vous aider en vous indiquant quelles fonctionnalités sont les plus adaptées ou lesquelles sont sur le point de sortir.

Besoin de plus d’informations ? Envie d’utiliser la plateforme ? Une question ou un commentaire ? Contactez le responsable de votre commune ou organisation. Ou contactez le support de CitizenLab via support@citizenlab.co.
fr-FR:
Ceci est une plateforme de participation à l'initiative de votre municipalité ou de votre organisation. Elle peut être utilisée pour différents processus de consultations publics : via une collecte d'idées, un vote, des discussions, un sondage, une enquête, un budget participatif, une cartographie interactive, un choix entre plusieurs scenarios, un soutien pour les conseils communaux, municipaux, ou les comités, etc.

Sur la page d'accueil, vous verrez quels sont les processus actifs et dans quelle phase ils se trouvent actuellement.

Comment puis-je me connecter sur la plateforme ?

Il est très simple de s'inscrire en entrant son nom, prénom et adresse e-mail. vous pouvez également utiliser votre compte Google ou Facebook. Seulement vos nom et prénom seront visibles pour les autres utilisateurs.

Puis-je utiliser la plateforme moi-même, pour organiser une consultation publique par exemple ?

Absolument. Demandez au responsable de votre commune ou de organisation de vous donner les droits nécessaires pour devenir un modérateur de projet. Une fois obtenus, vous pouvez créer votre propre projet et ligne de temps, et partager l'information que vous désirez (vidéos, documents, images, etc.) Cela vous donnera également la possibilité d'inviter d'autres utilisateurs sur la plateforme, de leur permettre de poster des idées au sein de votre projet, ou bien de voter et commenter.

Puis-je participer en tant qu'association, organisation, comité ?

Oui, c'est possible. Puisque seul le nom et le prénom de l'utilisateur sont visibles aux autres sur la plateforme, vous pouvez simplement utiliser le nom de votre organisation lors de la création de votre profil.

Pourquoi devrais-je utiliser cette plateforme au lieu de créer un site moi-même ?

Une équipe de développeurs et de spécialistes de la participation en ligne (CitizenLab, commissionné par votre commune ou votre organisation) améliore et met à jour cette plateforme au quotidien. Chaque bug notifié est résolu immédiatement et si vous avez des propositions créatives, ils peuvent vous aider en vous indiquant quelles fonctionnalités sont les plus adaptées ou lesquelles sont sur le point de sortir.

Besoin de plus d’informations ? Envie d’utiliser la plateforme ? Une question ou un commentaire ? Contactez le responsable de votre commune ou organisation. Ou contactez le support de CitizenLab via support@citizenlab.co.
hr-HR:
Ova sveobuhvatna platforma za sudjelovanje inicijativa je vaše općine ili organizacije i može se koristiti za različite procese javnih konzultacija: prikupljanje ideja, glasovanje, rasprave, upitnike, ankete, skupno određivanje proračuna, mapiranje na mreži, planiranje scenarija, podršku za savjetodavne odbore i komisije, ...

Na početnoj stranici vidjet ćete koji su procesi aktivni i u kojoj se fazi trenutačno nalaze.

Kako se mogu prijaviti na platformu?

Prijava je jednostavna tako da unesete svoje ime i prezime te svoju adresu e-pošte. Također možete koristiti svoj Google ili Facebook račun. Drugima će biti vidljivi samo vaše ime i prezime.

Mogu li sam koristiti platformu, npr. organizirati javno savjetovanje?

Apsolutno. Zamolite odgovorne u vašoj općini ili organizaciji da vam daju potrebna prava za dopuštenje da postanete moderator projekta. Nakon što dobijete ta dopuštenja, možete postaviti vlastiti projekt i vremenski okvir te dijeliti informacije koje želite (videozapise, dokumente, slike, ...). To će vam također omogućiti da pozovete druge na platformu, omogućujući im da objavljuju ideje unutar vašeg projekta, glasaju ili komentiraju.

Mogu li sudjelovati kao udruga/organizacija/odbor?

Da, to je moguće. S obzirom da su samo vaše ime i prezime vidljivi drugima na platformi, možete jednostavno koristiti naziv svoje organizacije dok postavljate svoj profil.

Zašto da koristim ovu platformu, a ne da sam napravim web-mjesto?

Tim predanih programera i stručnjaka za online sudjelovanje (CitizenLab, naručila vaša općina ili organizacija) poboljšava i ažurira ovu platformu na dnevnoj bazi. Čak i najmanja pogreška rješava se odmah, a ako imate kreativne prijedloge, oni vam mogu pomoći da istaknu koje se značajke platforme mogu koristiti za to ili koje su u pripremi.

Trebate više informacija? Želite li koristiti platformu? Imate pitanja ili povratne informacije? Obratite se odgovornom u vašoj općini ili organizaciji. Ili kontaktirajte CitizenLab putem support@citizenlab.co.
hu-HU:
This all-in-one participation platform is an initiative of your municipality or organisation and can be used for different public consultation processes: collecting ideas, voting, discussing, surveys, polls, participatory budgeting, online mapping, scenario planning, support for advisory boards and committees, ...

On the home page, you'll see which processes are active and in which phase they currently are.

How do I sign in on the platform?

Signing in is done easily by giving your first and last name and your e-mail address. You could also use your Google or Facebook account. Only your first and last name will be visible to others.

Can I use the platform myself, e.g. to organise a public consultation?

Absolutely. Ask the responsible within your municipality or organisation to give you the needed permission rights to become a project moderator. Once granted these permissions, you can set up your own project and timeline and share the information you want (video, documents, images, ...). This will also allow you to invite others to the platform, enabling them to post ideas within your project, vote or comment.

Can I participate as an association/organisation/committee?

Yes, that's possible. Given that only your first and last name are visible to others on the platform, you can simply use your organisation's name while setting up your profile.

Why would I use this platform and not create a website myself?

A team of dedicated developers and specialists in online participation (CitizenLab, commissioned by your municipality or organisation) is improving and updating this platform on a daily basis. Even the smallest bug gets tackled immediately and if you have creative proposals, they can help you pointing out which features of the platform can be used for this or which ones are in the pipeline.

Need more information? Do you want to use the platform? Questions or feedback? Contact the responsible within your municipality or organisation. Or contact CitizenLab through support@citizenlab.co.
it-IT:
Questa piattaforma di partecipazione all-in-one è un'iniziativa del vostro comune o organizzazione e può essere utilizzata per diversi processi di consultazione pubblica: raccolta di idee, votazione, discussione, sondaggi, sondaggi, bilancio partecipativo, mappatura online, pianificazione di scenari, supporto per consigli e comitati consultivi, ...

Nella home page, potrete vedere quali processi sono attivi e in quale fase sono attualmente.

Come si accede alla piattaforma?

L'accesso si fa facilmente dando il proprio nome, cognome e indirizzo e-mail. Potete anche usare il vostro account Google o Facebook. Solo il vostro nome e cognome saranno visibili agli altri.

Posso usare la piattaforma da solo, ad esempio per organizzare una consultazione pubblica?

Assolutamente. Chiedete al responsabile del vostro comune o della vostra organizzazione di darvi i permessi necessari per diventare un moderatore del progetto. Una volta concessi questi permessi, puoi impostare il tuo progetto e la tua linea temporale e condividere le informazioni che vuoi (video, documenti, immagini, ...). Questo vi permetterà anche di invitare altri alla piattaforma, permettendo loro di postare idee all'interno del vostro progetto, votare o commentare.

Posso partecipare come associazione/organizzazione/comitato?

Sì, è possibile. Dato che solo il vostro nome e cognome sono visibili agli altri sulla piattaforma, potete semplicemente usare il nome della vostra organizzazione mentre impostate il vostro profilo.

Perché dovrei usare questa piattaforma e non creare un sito web?

Un team di sviluppatori dedicati e specialisti nella partecipazione online (CitizenLab, commissionato dal vostro comune o organizzazione) sta migliorando e aggiornando questa piattaforma su base giornaliera. Anche il più piccolo bug viene affrontato immediatamente e se avete proposte creative, possono aiutarvi indicandovi quali caratteristiche della piattaforma possono essere utilizzate per questo o quali sono in cantiere.

Servono altre informazioni? Vuoi utilizzare la piattaforma? Domande o feedback? Contatta il responsabile del tuo comune o della tua organizzazione. Oppure contatta CitizenLab attraverso support@citizenlab.co.
kl-GL: Oplev mere information relateret til platformen.
lv-LV:
Šī daudzfunkciju līdzdalības platforma ir jūsu pašvaldības vai organizācijas iniciatīva, un to var izmantot dažādiem sabiedriskās apspriešanas procesiem: ideju vākšanai, balsošanai, diskusijām, aptaujām, apsekojumiem, līdzdalības budžeta veidošanai, tiešsaistes kartēšanai, scenāriju plānošanai, konsultatīvo padomju un komiteju atbalstam, ...

Sākumlapā jūs redzēsiet, kuri procesi ir aktīvi un kurā posmā tie pašlaik atrodas

Kā pierakstīties platformā?

Pierakstīšanās notiek vienkārši, norādot savu vārdu, uzvārdu un e-pasta adresi. Jūs varat izmantot arī savu Google vai Facebook kontu. Pārējiem būs redzams tikai jūsu vārds un uzvārds

.

Vai es pats varu izmantot platformu, piemēram, lai organizētu sabiedrisko apspriešanu?

Protams. Lūdziet atbildīgo personu savā pašvaldībā vai organizācijā piešķirt jums nepieciešamās atļaujas tiesības, lai kļūtu par projekta moderatoru. Pēc šo tiesību piešķiršanas jūs varat izveidot savu projektu un laika grafiku un kopīgot informāciju (video, dokumentus, attēlus u. c.). Tas ļaus jums arī uzaicināt citus dalībniekus piedalīties platformā, ļaujot viņiem publicēt idejas jūsu projektā, balsot vai komentēt.

Vai es varu piedalīties kā asociācija/organizācija/komiteja?

Ja, tas ir iespējams. Ņemot vērā, ka citiem platformā ir redzams tikai jūsu vārds un uzvārds, veidojot savu profilu, jūs varat vienkārši izmantot savas organizācijas nosaukumu

.

Kāpēc man vajadzētu izmantot šo platformu, nevis pašam izveidot tīmekļa vietni?

Šo platformu ik dienu uzlabo un atjaunina īpašu izstrādātāju un tiešsaistes līdzdalības speciālistu komanda (CitizenLab, kuras pasūtītājs ir jūsu pašvaldība vai organizācija). Pat mazākā kļūda tiek nekavējoties novērsta, un, ja jums ir radoši priekšlikumi, viņi var jums palīdzēt, norādot, kuras funkcijas var izmantot šim nolūkam vai kuras funkcijas atrodas izstrādāšanas stadijā.

Vai nepieciešama papildu informācija?Vai vēlaties izmantot platformu? Jautājumi vai atsauksmes? Sazinieties ar atbildīgo personu savā pašvaldībā vai organizācijā. Vai sazinieties ar CitizenLab, izmantojot support@citizenlab.co.
nb-NO:
This all-in-one participation platform is an initiative of your municipality or organisation and can be used for different public consultation processes: collecting ideas, voting, discussing, surveys, polls, participatory budgeting, online mapping, scenario planning, support for advisory boards and committees, ...

On the home page, you'll see which processes are active and in which phase they currently are.

How do I sign in on the platform?

Signing in is done easily by giving your first and last name and your e-mail address. You could also use your Google or Facebook account. Only your first and last name will be visible to others.

Can I use the platform myself, e.g. to organise a public consultation?

Absolutely. Ask the responsible within your municipality or organisation to give you the needed permission rights to become a project moderator. Once granted these permissions, you can set up your own project and timeline and share the information you want (video, documents, images, ...). This will also allow you to invite others to the platform, enabling them to post ideas within your project, vote or comment.

Can I participate as an association/organisation/committee?

Yes, that's possible. Given that only your first and last name are visible to others on the platform, you can simply use your organisation's name while setting up your profile.

Why would I use this platform and not create a website myself?

A team of dedicated developers and specialists in online participation (CitizenLab, commissioned by your municipality or organisation) is improving and updating this platform on a daily basis. Even the smallest bug gets tackled immediately and if you have creative proposals, they can help you pointing out which features of the platform can be used for this or which ones are in the pipeline.

Need more information? Do you want to use the platform? Questions or feedback? Contact the responsible within your municipality or organisation. Or contact CitizenLab through support@citizenlab.co.
nl-BE:
Dit all-in-one participatieplatform is een initiatief van jouw gemeente of organisatie en kan worden ingezet voor allerhande inspraakprocessen: ideeën ophalen, stemmen, discussiëren, enquêtes, polls, burgerbegroting, openbare onderzoeken, online mapping, scenarioplanning, ondersteuning voor adviesraden en comités, etc.

Op de homepagina zie je welke processen actief zijn of in welke fase een proces zich bevindt.

Hoe log ik in op het platform?

Inloggen kan eenvoudig door je aan te melden met je voornaam, naam en e-mailadres. Je kunt ook je Google- of Facebook-account gebruiken. Enkel je naam en voornaam is zichtbaar voor anderen.

Kan ik het platform zelf gebruiken, bijvoorbeeld om een inspraaktraject op te zetten?

Dat kan zeker. Vraag aan de verantwoordelijke persoon binnen jouw gemeente of organisatie om jou de nodige toegangsrechten te geven om van jou een projectmoderator te maken. Je kunt dan zelf je project en tijdslijn opzetten en de nodige informatie (video, documenten, afbeeldingen, …) delen. Ook kan je dan zelf anderen op het platform uitnodigen, waardoor ze binnen jouw project ideeën kunnen posten, of stemmen en reageren op bestaande ideeën.

Kan ik als vereniging/organisatie/comité deelnemen?

Ja, dat kan. Omdat voor andere gebruikers van het platform enkel je voornaam en naam zichtbaar is, vul je binnen je profiel dus gewoon de naam van je vereniging in. Bvb. naam: vzw en voornaam: De Globetrotters. Ongeacht je e-mailadres, zien andere mensen enkel vzw De Globetrotters.

Waarom zou ik dit platform gebruiken en niet zelf een website maken?

Een team van gedreven developers en specialisten in online participatie (CitizenLab, in opdracht van jouw gemeente of organisatie) is dagelijks bezig met dit platform te verbeteren en te updaten. De kleinste bug wordt direct aangepakt en als je zelf creatieve voorstellen hebt, kunnen we je zeggen welke toepassingen van het platform je hiervoor kunt gebruiken of welke er in de pijplijn zitten.

Meer informatie nodig? Wil je het platform gebruiken? Vragen of feedback? Contacteer de verantwoordelijke dienst of persoon van je gemeente of organisatie of neem contact met CitizenLab via support@citizenlab.co
nl-NL:
Dit all-in-one participatieplatform is een initiatief van jouw gemeente of organisatie en kan worden ingezet voor allerhande inspraakprocessen: ideeën ophalen, stemmen, discussiëren, enquêtes, polls, burgerbegroting, openbare onderzoeken, online mapping, scenarioplanning, ondersteuning voor adviesraden en comités, etc.

Op de homepagina zie je welke processen actief zijn of in welke fase een proces zich bevindt.

Hoe log ik in op het platform?

Inloggen kan eenvoudig door je aan te melden met je voornaam, naam en e-mailadres. Je kunt ook je Google- of Facebook-account gebruiken. Enkel je naam en voornaam is zichtbaar voor anderen.

Kan ik het platform zelf gebruiken, bijvoorbeeld om een inspraaktraject op te zetten?

Dat kan zeker. Vraag aan de verantwoordelijke persoon binnen jouw gemeente of organisatie om jou de nodige toegangsrechten te geven om van jou een projectmoderator te maken. Je kunt dan zelf je project en tijdslijn opzetten en de nodige informatie (video, documenten, afbeeldingen, …) delen. Ja, dat kan. Omdat voor andere gebruikers van het platform enkel je voornaam en naam zichtbaar is, vul je binnen je profiel dus gewoon de naam van je vereniging in. Bvb. naam: vzw en voornaam: De Globetrotters. Ongeacht je e-mailadres, zien andere mensen enkel vzw De Globetrotters.

Waarom zou ik dit platform gebruiken en niet zelf een website maken?

Een team van gedreven developers en specialisten in online participatie (CitizenLab, in opdracht van jouw gemeente of organisatie) is dagelijks bezig met dit platform te verbeteren en te updaten. De kleinste bug wordt direct aangepakt en als je zelf creatieve voorstellen hebt, kunnen we je zeggen welke toepassingen van het platform je hiervoor kunt gebruiken of welke er in de pijplijn zitten.

Meer informatie nodig? Wil je het platform gebruiken? Vragen of feedback? Contacteer de verantwoordelijke dienst of persoon van je gemeente of organisatie of neem contact met CitizenLab via support@citizenlab.co
pl-PL:
Ta platforma partycypacyjna jest inicjatywą Twojej gminy lub organizacji i może być wykorzystana w różnych procesach konsultacji społecznych: zbieranie pomysłów, głosowania, dyskusji, przeprowadzania ankiet, przeprowadzania badań, głosowania nad budżetem partycypacyjnym, mapowania online, planowania scenariuszy, wsparcie dla rad doradczych i komisji, ...

Na stronie głównej zobaczysz, które procesy są aktywne i na jakim etapie są obecnie.

Jak zalogować się na platformie?

Logowanie jest proste i możesz tego dokonać przez podanie swojego imienia i nazwiska oraz adresu e-mail. Możesz również użyć swojego konta Google lub Facebook. Tylko Twoje imię i nazwisko będzie widoczne dla innych.

Czy mogę samodzielnie korzystać z platformy, np. w celu zorganizowania konsultacji społecznych?

Oczywiście. Poproś osobę odpowiedzialną w Twojej gminie lub organizacji, aby nadała Ci niezbędne uprawnienia do zostania moderatorem projektu. Po przyznaniu tych uprawnień, możesz stworzyć własny projekt i oś czasu oraz dzielić się informacjami (video, dokumenty, zdjęcia, ...). Pozwoli Ci to również na zapraszanie innych do platformy, umożliwiając im zamieszczanie pomysłów w ramach Twojego projektu, głosowanie lub komentowanie.

Czy mogę uczestniczyć jako stowarzyszenie/organizacja/komitet?

Tak, jest to możliwe. Biorąc pod uwagę, że tylko Twoje imię i nazwisko są widoczne dla innych na platformie, możesz po prostu użyć nazwy swojej organizacji podczas tworzenia swojego profilu.

Dlaczego miałbym korzystać z tej platformy, a nie tworzyć stronę internetową samemu?

Zespół dedykowanych programistów i specjalistów ds. uczestnictwa online (CitizenLab, na zlecenie Twojej gminy lub organizacji) codziennie ulepsza i aktualizuje tę platformę. Nawet najmniejszy błąd jest rozwiązywany natychmiast. Jeśli masz kreatywne propozycje, zespół CitizeLab pomoże Ci wskazać, które funkcje platformy mogą być wykorzystane w celu ich realizacji lub które funkcje są w przygotowaniu.

Potrzebujesz więcej informacji? Czy chcesz korzystać z platformy? Masz pytania lub uwagi? Skontaktuj się z osobą odpowiedzialną w Twojej gminie lub organizacji. Możesz też skontaktować się z CitizenLab poprzez support@citizenlab.co.
pt-BR:
This all-in-one participation platform is an initiative of your municipality or organisation and can be used for different public consultation processes: collecting ideas, voting, discussing, surveys, polls, participatory budgeting, online mapping, scenario planning, support for advisory boards and committees, ...

On the home page, you'll see which processes are active and in which phase they currently are.

How do I sign in on the platform?

Signing in is done easily by giving your first and last name and your e-mail address. You could also use your Google or Facebook account. Only your first and last name will be visible to others.

Can I use the platform myself, e.g. to organise a public consultation?

Absolutely. Ask the responsible within your municipality or organisation to give you the needed permission rights to become a project moderator. Once granted these permissions, you can set up your own project and timeline and share the information you want (video, documents, images, ...). This will also allow you to invite others to the platform, enabling them to post ideas within your project, vote or comment.

Can I participate as an association/organisation/committee?

Yes, that's possible. Given that only your first and last name are visible to others on the platform, you can simply use your organisation's name while setting up your profile.

Why would I use this platform and not create a website myself?

A team of dedicated developers and specialists in online participation (CitizenLab, commissioned by your municipality or organisation) is improving and updating this platform on a daily basis. Even the smallest bug gets tackled immediately and if you have creative proposals, they can help you pointing out which features of the platform can be used for this or which ones are in the pipeline.

Need more information? Do you want to use the platform? Questions or feedback? Contact the responsible within your municipality or organisation. Or contact CitizenLab through support@citizenlab.co.
ro-RO:
Această platformă de participare integrală este o inițiativă a orașului sau organizației dvs. și poate fi utilizată pentru diferite procese de consultare publică: colectare de idei, votare, discuții, chestionare, sondaje, bugetare participativă, cartografiere online, planificare de scenarii, sprijin pentru consilii consultative și comisii, ...

Pe pagina principală, veți vedea care sunt procesele active și în ce fază se află în prezent.

Cum mă conectez pe platformă?

Conectarea se face cu ușurință, dându-vă numele, prenumele și adresa de e-mail. De asemenea, puteți utiliza contul Google sau Facebook. Numai numele și prenumele dvs. vor fi vizibile pentru ceilalți.

Pot folosi platforma, pentru a organiza o consultare publică?

Absolut. Rugați responsabilii din orașul sau organizația dvs. să vă acorde drepturile de permisiune necesare pentru a deveni un moderator de proiect. Odată ce ați primit aceste permisiuni, puteți configura propriul proiect și propria cronologie și puteți distribui informațiile dorite (video, documente, imagini, ...). Acest lucru vă va permite, de asemenea, să invitați altepersoane pe platformă, permițându-le să posteze idei în cadrul proiectului, să voteze sau să comenteze.

Pot participa ca asociație / organizație / comitet?

Da, este posibil. Având în vedere că doar prenumele și prenumele dvs. sunt vizibile pentru ceilalți de pe platformă, puteți utiliza pur și simplu numele organizației dvs. în timpul configurarii profilului.

De ce aș folosi această platformă și nu aș crea singur un site web?

O echipă de dezvoltatori dedicați și specialiști în participarea online ( CitizenLab, comandată de municipalitatea sau organizația dvs.) îmbunătățește și actualizează zilnic această platformă. Chiar și cea mai mică eroare este tratată imediat și dacă aveți propuneri creative, platforma vă pot ajuta să evidențiați care sunt caracteristicile care pot fi utilizate pentru aceasta.

Marea Ai nevoie de mai multe informații? Vrei să folosești platforma? Ai întrebări sau păreri? Contactați responsabilii din cadrul municipalității sau organizației dvs. sau contactați CitizenLab prin support@citizenlab.co.
sr-SP:
Ova platforma za učešće inicijativa je vaše opštine ili organizacije i može se koristiti za različite procese javnih konsultacija: prikupljanje ideja, glasanje, diskusije, ankete, upitnike, participativno budžetiranje, mapiranje, planiranje scenarija, podršku savetodavnim odborima ...

Na početnoj stranici videćete koji su procesi aktivni i u kojoj su fazi trenutno.

Kako da se prijavim na platformu?

Prijavljivanje se vrši lako - navođenjem imena i prezimena i email adrese. Takođe, možete da koristite svoj Google ili Facebook nalog. Samo će vaše ime i prezime biti vidljivo drugima.

Mogu li sam da koristim platformu, npr. kako bih organizovao javnu raspravu?

Apsolutno. Zatražite od odgovornih u vašoj opštini ili organizaciji da vam daju potrebna prava i dozvole kako biste postali moderator projekta. Jednom kada dobijete ove dozvole, možete da postavite svoj projekat i vremenske okvire, kao i da delite informacije koje želite (video, dokumente, slike ...). Ovo će vam takođe omogućiti da pozovete druge na platformu, i podstaknete ih da postavljaju ideje u okviru vašeg projekta, glasaju ili komentarišu.

Mogu li da učestvujem kao udruženje/organizacija/odbor?

Da, to je moguće. S obzirom na to da su drugima samo vaša imena i prezimena vidljiva na platformi, možete jednostavno koristiti ime svoje organizacije prilikom kreiranja profila.

Zašto bih koristio ovu platformu, umesto da sam kreiram svoju web stranicu?

Tim posvećenih programera i stručnjaka za onlajn učešće (CitizenLab, po nalogu vaše opštine ili organizacije) svakodnevno poboljšava i ažurira ovu platformu. Čak se i najmanja greška rešava odmah, a ako imate kreativne predloge, oni vam mogu pomoći da uvidite koje se funkcije platforme mogu koristiti za njih.

Potrebno vam je više informacija? Želite li da koristite platformu? Pitanja ili utisci? Obratite se odgovornima u vašoj opštini ili organizaciji, ili kontaktirajte CitizenLab putem support@citizenlab.co.
sv-SE:
Den här helhetslösningen till plattform för deltagande är ett initiativ från din kommun eller organisation och kan användas för olika offentliga samrådsprocesser: samla in idéer, rösta, diskutera, undersökningar, omröstningar, deltagande budgetering, onlinekartläggning, scenarieplanering, stöd för rådgivande nämnder och kommittéer, ...

På startsidan ser du vilka processer som är aktiva och i vilken fas de finns för närvarande.

Hur loggar jag in på plattformen?

Du loggar enkelt in genom att ange ditt för- och efternamn samt din e-postadress. Du kan också använda ditt Google- eller Facebook-konto. Endast ditt för- och efternamn kommer att visas för andra.

Kan jag använda plattformen själv, t.ex. för att organisera ett offentligt samråd?

Absolut. Be den ansvariga i din kommun eller organisation att ge dig nödvändiga behörigheter för att bli projektmoderator. När du har beviljats de här behörigheterna kan du skapa ditt eget projekt och din egen tidslinje och dela den information du vill ha (video, dokument, bilder, ...). Detta gör att du också kan bjuda in andra till plattformen, vilket gör att de kan lägga upp idéer i ditt projekt, rösta eller kommentera.

Kan jag delta som förening/organisation/kommitté?

Ja, det är möjligt. Med tanke på att endast ditt för- och efternamn visas för andra på plattformen kan du helt enkelt använda din organisations namn när du skapar din profil.

Varför skulle jag använda den här plattformen och inte skapa en webbplats själv?

Ett team med engagerade utvecklare och specialister på onlinedeltagande (CitizenLab, har anlitats av din kommun eller organisation) förbättrar och uppdaterar den här plattformen varje dag. Minsta lilla bugg åtgärdas snabbt och om du har kreativa förslag kan de hjälpa dig veta vilka funktioner på plattformen som kan användas för det eller vilka som är på gång.

Behöver du mer information? Vill du använda plattformen? Frågor eller återkoppling? Kontakta den ansvariga personen i din kommun eller organisation. Eller kontakta CitizenLab på support@citizenlab.co.
tr-TR:
Bu tam kapsamlı katılım platformu belediyenizin veya kuruluşunuzun bir girişimidir ve fikir toplama, oylama, tartışma, anket, katılımcı bütçe oluşturma, çevrimiçi haritalama, senaryo planlama, danışma kurulları ve komiteler için destek vb. kamuya danışma süreçlerinde kullanılabilir.

Ana sayfada, hangi süreçlerinin aktif olduğunu ve şu anda hangi aşamada olduklarını görebilirsiniz.

Platformda nasıl oturum açarım?

Adınızı, soyadınızı ve e-posta adresinizi girerek kolayca oturum açabilirsiniz. Google veya Facebook hesabınızı da kullanabilirsiniz. Başkaları tarafından sadece adınız ve soyadınız görülebilecektir.

Platformu kendim kullanabilir miyim? Örneğin bir kamuoyu görüşü almak için?

Kesinlikle kullanabilirsiniz. Belediyenizdeki veya kuruluşunuzdaki sorumludan size proje moderatörü olmanız için gerekli izinleri vermesini isteyin. Bu izinler verildikten sonra, kendi projenizi ve zaman çizelgenizi oluşturabilir ve istediğiniz bilgileri (video, belge, resim vb.) paylaşabilirsiniz. Bu, başkalarını platforma davet etmenize, projenizde fikir yayınlamalarına, oy vermelerine veya yorum yapmalarına da olanak tanır.

Bir dernek/kuruluş/komite olarak katılabilir miyim?

Evet, bu mümkün. Platformda sadece adınız ve soyadınız başkaları tarafından görülebildiğinden, profilinizi oluştururken kuruluşunuzun adını kullanmanız yeterlidir.

Neden kendim bir web sitesi oluşturmak yerine bu platformu kullanayım?

Çevrimiçi katılım konusunda uzman ve kendini işine adamış geliştiricilerden oluşan bir ekip (CitizenLab, belediyeniz veya kuruluşunuz tarafından görevlendirilmiştir) bu platformu günlük olarak geliştirmekte ve güncellemektedir. En küçük bir hata bile anında giderilir ve yaratıcı önerileriniz varsa platformda hangi özellikleri kullanabileceğinizi veya hangilerinin yakında kullanılabilir hale geleceğini göstererek size yardımcı olabilirler.

Daha fazla bilgiye mi ihtiyacınız var? Platformu kullanmak istiyor musunuz? Sorularınız veya geri bildiriminiz mi var? Belediyenizdeki veya kuruluşunuzdaki sorumlu kişilerle ya da support@citizenlab.co adresinden CitizenLab ile iletişime geçin.
sr-Latn:
Ova platforma za učešće inicijativa je vaše opštine ili organizacije i može se koristiti za različite procese javnih konsultacija: prikupljanje ideja, glasanje, diskusije, ankete, upitnike, participativno budžetiranje, mapiranje, planiranje scenarija, podršku savetodavnim odborima ...

Na početnoj stranici videćete koji su procesi aktivni i u kojoj su fazi trenutno.

Kako da se prijavim na platformu?

Prijavljivanje se vrši lako - navođenjem imena i prezimena i email adrese. Takođe, možete da koristite svoj Google ili Facebook nalog. Samo će vaše ime i prezime biti vidljivo drugima.

Mogu li sam da koristim platformu, npr. kako bih organizovao javnu raspravu?

Apsolutno. Zatražite od odgovornih u vašoj opštini ili organizaciji da vam daju potrebna prava i dozvole kako biste postali moderator projekta. Jednom kada dobijete ove dozvole, možete da postavite svoj projekat i vremenske okvire, kao i da delite informacije koje želite (video, dokumente, slike ...). Ovo će vam takođe omogućiti da pozovete druge na platformu, i podstaknete ih da postavljaju ideje u okviru vašeg projekta, glasaju ili komentarišu.

Mogu li da učestvujem kao udruženje/organizacija/odbor?

Da, to je moguće. S obzirom na to da su drugima samo vaša imena i prezimena vidljiva na platformi, možete jednostavno koristiti ime svoje organizacije prilikom kreiranja profila.

Zašto bih koristio ovu platformu, umesto da sam kreiram svoju web stranicu?

Tim posvećenih programera i stručnjaka za onlajn učešće (CitizenLab, po nalogu vaše opštine ili organizacije) svakodnevno poboljšava i ažurira ovu platformu. Čak se i najmanja greška rešava odmah, a ako imate kreativne predloge, oni vam mogu pomoći da uvidite koje se funkcije platforme mogu koristiti za njih.

Potrebno vam je više informacija? Želite li da koristite platformu? Pitanja ili utisci? Obratite se odgovornima u vašoj opštini ili organizaciji, ili kontaktirajte CitizenLab putem support@citizenlab.co.
